Model SHIP_test, Test Zmethod_TiAl
Test run at 2019-09-20 12:58

model file: ../../models/SHIP_test/model.py
============================================================
import pyjulip
import os
import glob

model_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__))
pot_name = glob.glob(os.path.join(model_dir,"*.json"))[0]

calculator = pyjulip.SHIP(pot_name)

no_checkpoint = True

name = 'SHIP'
============================================================
test file: /Users/Cas/gits/ship-testing-framework/scripts/../tests/TiAl/Zmethod_TiAl/test.py
============================================================
import model
import os
import subprocess
import sys
from ase.io import read, write
import zmethod

calculator = model.calculator

at = read(os.path.join(os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(__file__)), "bulk.xyz"))
big_at = at * (5,5,5)

Etot, Ekin, Epot, T, P = zmethod.Zmethod(calculator, big_at, nsteps=20, dt=1, A=0.01, T=3500, R=5, save_config=1, name="TiAl")

properties = { 'E_tot' : Etot, 'E_kin' : Ekin, 'E_pot' : Epot, 'T' : T, 'P' : P }
